game.beginning: In a world ravaged by climate disasters, humanity's last hope for survival lies in an underwater colony known as New Eden.
game.ending: The protagonist must choose between saving New Eden and risking everything to reclaim the surface after uncovering a plot to control remaining resources on Earth.
game.synopsis: "Echoes of the Abyss" follows the journey of a young engineer who uncovers a hidden message from the past, setting them on a quest to unravel the mysteries behind humanity's downfall. As they navigate treacherous politics and confront dark secrets, they must decide the fate of New Eden.
game.title: Echoes of the Abyss
